Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Brevinin-2LTa (XXU; 1S=S, UCSS1a; natural AMPs; frog, amphibians, animals)
Sequence Information.Source: the broad-folded frog,Hylarana latouchii, China, Asia

Literature Information.Literature: Activity: Active against S. aureus ATCC2592 (MIC 2 uM), B. licheniformis X39 (IS) (MIC 8 uM), S. carnosus KHS (IS) (MIC 2 uM), R. rhodochrous X15 (IS) (MIC 0.5 uM), E. coli ATCC 25922 (MIC 32.5 uM), S.rubidaea X01 (IS) (MIC 130 uM), P. aeruginosa 1.50 (IS) (MIC 65 uM), P. faecalis X29 (IS)  (MIC 0.5 uM).Toxicity: Hemolytic HC50 520 uM. Updated 10/2020
Literature Information.Author: Wang H, Yu Z, Hu Y, Yu H, Ran R, Xia J, Wang D, Yang S, Yang X, Liu J.2012
Literature Information.Title: Molecular cloning and characterization of antimicrobial peptides from skin of the broad-folded frog, Hylarana latouchii.
